numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed a trend from the 50th percentile to the 70th percentile.
2. In this range, the rate of applicants without legacy status decreased.
3. In this range, the rate of legacy applicants increased.
4. I wonder how this trend varies from school to school.
5. One school may value legacy applicants more than applicants without legacy status.
6. Another school may value applicants without legacy status more than legacy applicants.
7. This topic relates to my community.
8. High school students apply to schools.
9. High school students need to be aware of data like this during the application process.
10. If a student is aware of this data, then the student can estimate the student's probability of admission.
11. If a student is aware of this data, then the student can estimate what odds are stacked against the student.
12. If a student is aware of this data, then the student can estimate what odds are stacked in favor of the student.
14. The headline is: "Are the odds in your favor?"
